name: bj-disjsn01

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls)
-| wne(emptycls, c1o)
-| wi(wne(emptycls, c1o), wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls))

|- wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls)

-| wi(wne(emptycls, c1o), wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls))

|- wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls)

comment: Disjointness of the singletons containing 0 and 1. This is a consequence of ~ bj-disjcsn but the present proof does not use regularity. (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
